title: Annoyed by those campaign fliers cluttering your mailbox? Here's how to make them stop
dc:creator: Christie D'Zurilla
description: There are a couple of ways to get your name taken off political campaigns' direct-mailing lists. But one way works better
content:encoded: There are a couple of ways to get your name taken off political campaigns' direct-mailing lists. But one way works better

media:content.media:description: Campaign mail from the November 2022 election in a Los Angeles resident's mailbox.
media:content.media:credit: Photo illustration by James Reed / Los Angeles Times
